Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: As a token infrastructure developer (prover peer) I would like to allow for processing indirect TransferFrom proof computation requests
Issue.description: Prover peer component developed in FAB-11965 should be extended to support computation of a TokenTransaction that contains an indirect TransferFrom request. Notice that in this case Approve requests may need to be extended to allow for delegating the spending of a token to a chaincode.
